name: Elementer (tan_23)
description:
All the 4 crates are missing which contain sensitive data for the protection of the country. You need to defeat all the enemies and take back all the crates and get a chance to be the hero for your country!.

This game is a part of the 2022 Virtus Game Jam: Theme is- "Four Elements"

It correlates with the theme in the following ways:

1.The player has "four" special abilities

2. You need to find "four" crates

3. There are "four" enemies protecting "four" crates

Input in the game:

1. WASD , Spacebar {Jump} to move

2.Left Shift for Dash . You can dash two times and after that there is a 2 second cooldown

3. P to pause the game

4. Left ctrl and right ctrl {Hold System} to crouch

5. L to add more health

6.  Alt +x  to slow down the time for a fixed period 

7.  Left Click to attack

8.  K to switch weapon {pistol and knife}. Pistol can be used after picking up the pistol

9. H to heal so that the player will not receive damage for a fixed period 

10. Left Click to attack {Same for pistol and knife}

11. R to reload {Pistol}
